  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player​(java.lang.String name, char displayChar, int hitPoints) throws java.lang.Exception
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      name - Name to call the player in the UI
      displayChar - Character to represent the player in the UI
      hitPoints - Player's starting number of hitpoints
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

  • Method Details

    • playTurn

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action playTurn​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actions actions, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action lastAction, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Display display)
      Select and return an action for current turn. Player can harvest if there is ripen crop nearby. If not, Player can eat if damaged. Player can also craft a new weapon if it is holding craftable item. Player can use the ranged weapon to attack if there is one in the inventory. Player can wander around too.
      Overrides:
      playTurn in class Human
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      the Action to be performed

    • concentrateAction

      public static void concentrateAction​(ChooseTargetAction action, int focusValue)
      Get the chooseTargetAction executed last turn as class variable.

    • getWeapon

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Weapon getWeapon()
      Get the weapon for Player to use. Weapon will be chosen with highest damage. If the Player is not carrying any weapon, it will return Player's natural fighting equipment.
      Overrides:
      getWeapon in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
      Returns:
      the Player's weapon

    • hurt

      public void hurt​(int points)
      Do some damage to the current Actor.

      If the Actor's hitpoints go down to zero, it will be knocked out.

      Overrides:
      hurt in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
      Parameters:
      points - number of hitpoints to deduct.

    • heal

      public void heal​(int points)
      Add points to the current Actor's hitpoint total.

      This cannot take the hitpoints over the Actor's maximum. If there is an overflow, hitpoints are silently capped at the maximum.

      Does not check for consciousness: unconscious Actors can still be healed if the game client allows.

      Overrides:
      heal in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
      Parameters:
      points - number of hitpoints to add.
